item.description:
Hi Trailblazers!  Don't sit at home the day after Thanksgiving--come join us for a party at Charlie's beautiful condo in Rochester, NH.

The exact location will be emailed out a few days prior to those who have RSVP'd Yes.

Let's have a Yankee Swap, potluck dinner, and play some games.  Please bring a Yankee Swap gift ($10-$15), some food to share, and maybe a game to play.  We'll have a Karaoke machine and we could also be playing Apples to Apples, Catch Phrase, or something that you bring.

BYOB

Three other Meetup groups will be joining us, so sign up early!

Let's have some fun with the Yankee Swap--kitschy, unusual, creative is great!

We look forward to seeing you,

Debbie, Charlie, and Val
item.how_to_find_us: The exact address/directions will be emailed a few days prior to the party.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Yankee Swap, Game Night & Potluck Dinner
